title: Jackpot/Gambling Feature
body:
I'm just here to discuss about my idea of a Jackpot/gambling feature that could be implemented, Meaning players could be able to gamble a hefty amount of IP in hopes of recieving a possible Random Skin, Icon & Boost..  I believe it would be a great feature for both paying and non paying members alike. 

Please feel free to comment, give suggestions & feedback about this idea, All are welcome to have a say. :')

**Below will be a poll, please choose either one! ✓**
